title: Torque ranking - how torque changes as rod falls

content.description: A uniform rod is free to rotate about a pivot at its bottom end, as shown in the figures. The rod is released from rest while at a small angle from the vertical at time <math alttext="t sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>. The three figures show the rod at the following times.
